sentences: Jack Reno (November 30, 1935 â€“ November 1, 2008) was an American country singer.
Born in Bloomfield, Iowa, United States, Reno appeared at the Grand Ole Opry in the 1960s, and played with Waylon Jennings and Dolly Parton.
In addition, he was a long-time country music DJ, with stints in Cincinnati, Ohio and Omaha, Nebraska.
He named as the Country Music Association's Disc Jockey of the Year in 1978.
